name: @prosopo/workspace
author: Prosopo

scripts.cmd: e() { $@ ;}; f() { cmd="$1"; shift; for arg in $@; do str=$(printf "$cmd" "$arg"); echo exec: $str; echo; e $str || exit 1; done ;}; f
scripts.build+deps: f() { npm run build $(npm run deps $@) ;}; f
scripts.clean+deps: f() { npm run clean $(npm run deps $@) ;}; f
scripts.rebuild: f() { npm run cmd "npm run clean %s" $@ ; npm run cmd "npm run build %s" $@ ;}; f
scripts.rebuild+deps: f() { npm run rebuild $(npm run deps $@) ;}; f
scripts.deps:
f() { for arg in $@; do deps=$(npm run deps:$arg); (f $deps); echo -n " $arg"; done ;}; g() { pkgs=$(f $@); pkgs=$(echo $pkgs | tr ' ' '
' | awk '!a[$0]++' | tr '
' ' '); echo $pkgs ;}; g
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:npm && npm run clean:ts
scripts.mon:provider: npx nodemon $(npm run deps provider | xargs printf ' -w packages/%s') 'npm start -w @prosopo/provider'
scripts.watch:provider: npm run watch:ts & npm run mon:provider & wait
scripts.gitmod: f() { echo "cmd: $@"; echo; name=$(basename -s .git `git config --get remote.origin.url`); echo Entering "'$name'"; eval $@; git submodule foreach --recursive "eval $@ || :" ;}; f
scripts.set-upstream: npm run gitmod -- git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/`git symbolic-ref --short HEAD` `git symbolic-ref --short HEAD`
scripts.pull: npm run gitmod -- 'git pull origin $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)'
scripts.push: npm run gitmod -- git push -u origin HEAD
scripts.branch: f() { npm run gitmod -- "git switch -C $1 && git switch -C $1 origin/$1 || :" ;}; f
scripts.delete: f() { npm run gitmod -- git branch -d $1 ;}; f
scripts.delete:force: f() { npm run gitmod -- git branch -D $1 ;}; f
scripts.delete:remote: f() { npm run gitmod -- git push origin --delete $1 ;}; f
scripts.purge:local: npm run gitmod -- "git branch | grep -v develop | grep -v master | grep -v main | xargs git branch -D"
scripts.pr: f() { npm run gitmod -- gh pr create --base develop --assignee \"@me\" --title \"$1\" --fill --reviewer \"$2\" ;}; f
scripts.release: f() { npm run gitmod -- gh pr create --base main --assignee \"@me\" --title \"$1\" --fill --reviewer \"$2\" ;}; f
scripts.stash: npm run gitmod -- git stash push
scripts.stash:named: npm run gitmod -- git stash push -m
scripts.unstash: npm run gitmod -- git stash pop
scripts.stash:drop: npm run gitmod -- git stash drop
scripts.stash:clear: npm run gitmod -- git stash clear
scripts.ls:ws: npm run --workspaces env | grep npm_package_name | cut -d '=' -f 2
scripts.test: npm run remove-test-container && docker compose --file docker-compose.test.yml up -d substrate-test-node && npm -w @prosopo/provider run test

description: Integrates protocol and provider for development purposes
